bibl.title: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Jose Rodriguez Perez, August 20, 1941

div1.p: Hench inquires about obtaining photostats of publications on Military Hospital No. 1.

div1.head: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Jose Rodriguez Perez, August 20, 1941
div1.opener:
Finlay Institute - Iharan
August 20, 1941
Dr. J. F. Rodriguez Perez
Director de la Seccion de Publicaciones
Ceintificas y Biblioteca
Instituto Finlay
Habana, Cuba
My dear Doctor Perez:
div1.p:
May I thank you most kindly for your letter about
my request for the history of Military Hospital Number One
of Galliol, 1903. I cannot blame you for not wishing to
let it go out of the library since it is the only copy you
have.

I received the “Revista de Medicina y Cirugia de
la Habana” with the article on the hospital, today. I
appreciate your kindness very much indeed.

You say that I could get photostatic copies of
the Galliol article. How much would it cost to have photo-
stats of the entire booklet? I appreciate very greatly
your courtesy in this matter.
div1.closer: Very truly yours, P. S. Hench, M. D. psh:ds
